DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Data Sentinel CDM Original Diagnosis Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._Length is site specific. Original diagnosis from source table, if different.
